cu.explanation_en: Setting the NGU IP address to an invalid format like '999.999.999.999' will cause network connection failures and prevent proper UPF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PRACH configuration index to -1 is out of the valid range and may cause RACH procedure failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PRACH 配置索引設定為 -1 超出有效範圍，可能導致 RACH 程序失敗。
